case left
color : ↑(Set.Icc 1 solution_value) → Fin 2
⊢ coloring_is_good color

a : ℝ
ha : 1 < a
⊢ Bounded (solution a ha) ∧ ∀ (i j : ℕ), i ≠ j → 1 ≤ |solution a ha i - solution a ha j| * |↑i - ↑j|

n : ℕ
x : Fin n → ℝ
⊢ ∑ i, ∑ j, √|x i - x j| ≤ ∑ i, ∑ j, √|x i + x j|

a b c : ℤ
⊢ (a, b, c) ∈ SolutionSet ↔
    0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ is_power_of_two (a * b - c) ∧ is_power_of_two (b * c - a) ∧ is_power_of_two (c * a - b)
⊢ if DoesExist = true then ∃ f, Good f else ¬∃ f, Good f

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
a x : Fin n → ℝ
h : Monotone x
⊢ (⨆ i, d a i) / 2 ≤ ⨆ i, |x i - a i|

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
a : Fin n → ℝ
⊢ ∃ x, Monotone x ∧ (⨆ i, d a i) / 2 = ⨆ i, |x i - a i|

k : ℕ
hk : 2 ≤ k
a : ℕ+ → ℕ+
⊢ a ∈ SolutionSet hk ↔
    ∃ P,
      P.Monic ∧
        P.degree = ↑k ∧
          (∀ n ≤ k, 0 ≤ P.coeff n) ∧
            ∀ (n : ℕ+), Polynomial.eval (↑↑(a n)) P = ↑↑(∏ i ∈ Finset.range k, a ⟨↑n + i + 1, ⋯⟩)

G : Set (ℝ → ℝ)
hf : ∀ f ∈ G, ∃ a b, a ≠ 0 ∧ ∀ (x : ℝ), f x = a * x + b
hG : ∀ f ∈ G, ∀ g ∈ G, g ∘ f ∈ G
hinv : ∀ f ∈ G, (∀ (x : ℝ), f x ≠ 0) → f⁻¹ ∈ G
hfix : ∀ f ∈ G, ∃ x, f x = x
⊢ ∃ k, ∀ f ∈ G, f k = k

n : ℕ
x : ℝ
hx : ∀ (t : ℕ) (k : ℤ), x ≠ ↑k * Real.pi / 2 ^ t
⊢ ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, 1 / Real.sin (2 ^ (i + 1) * x) = 1 / Real.tan x - 1 / Real.tan (2 ^ n * x)

A : ZMod 3 → EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)
hABC : AffineIndependent ℝ ![A 0, A 1, A 2]
ω : Fin 7 → Circle
hTangent : ∀ i < 6, ExternallyTangent (ω i) (ω (i + 1))
hA : ∀ i < 7, A ↑i ∈ ω ↑i ∧ A (↑i + 1) ∈ ω ↑i
⊢ ω 0 = ω 6

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
⊢ d (n + 1).factorial ≤ 2 * d n.factorial

⊢ ∃ n, 0 < n ∧ ∃ a, ∀ s ∈ S, ∑ i ∈ Finset.range n, a i * s.1 ^ i * s.2 ^ (n - i) = 1
⊢ {(n, m) | (2 ^ n - 3).Coprime (2 ^ m - 3)}.Infinite

n : ℕ
c : Fin (4 * n) → Fin n
h : ∀ (i : Fin n), #{j | c j = i} = 4
⊢ ∃ S, ∑ i ∈ S, (↑i + 1) = ∑ i ∈ Sᶜ, (↑i + 1) ∧ ∀ (i : Fin n), #({j ∈ S | c j = i}) = 2

t : Affine.Triangle ℝ (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2))
⊢ ∡ (Affine.Simplex.circumcenter t) (t.points 2) (t.points 1) = ↑Real.pi - ∡ (t.points 1) (t.points 0) (t.points 2)

A B C : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)
hABC : AffineIndependent ℝ ![A, B, C]
hAcuteA : ∠ C A B < Real.pi / 2
hAcuteB : ∠ A B C < Real.pi / 2
hAcuteC : ∠ B C A < Real.pi / 2
hAB : ∠ A B C + Real.pi / 6 ≤ ∠ B C A
ABC : Affine.Triangle ℝ (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)) := { points := ![A, B, C], independent := hABC }
P : ↥(affineSpan ℝ {B, C}) := (EuclideanGeometry.orthogonalProjection (affineSpan ℝ {B, C})) A
⊢ ∠ C A B + ∠ C (Affine.Simplex.circumcenter ABC) ↑P < Real.pi / 2

a0 : ℕ
⊢ a0 ∈ solution_set ↔ ∃ A, {n | a a0 n = A}.Infinite

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
⊢ ∃ k,
    (∀ (i : Fin (n + 1)), 1 < k i) ∧
      (∀ (i j : Fin (n + 1)), i ≠ j → (k i).Coprime (k j)) ∧ ∃ m, ∏ i, k i = 1 + m * (m + 1)

n : ℕ
⊢ n ∈ SolutionSet ↔
    1 < n ∧
      ∀ (α : Type) [inst : Fintype α],
        Fintype.card α = n →
          ∀ (f : α → ℕ+),
            (Pairwise fun a b => ∃ s, s.Nonempty ∧ geometric_mean f s = (↑↑(f a) + ↑↑(f b)) / 2) →
              ∃ y, ∀ (a : α), f a = y

x₁ x₂ x₃ x₄ x₅ y : ℝ
⊢ (x₁, x₂, x₃, x₄, x₅) ∈ SolutionSet y ↔
    x₅ + x₂ = y * x₁ ∧ x₁ + x₃ = y * x₂ ∧ x₂ + x₄ = y * x₃ ∧ x₃ + x₅ = y * x₄ ∧ x₄ + x₁ = y * x₅

case left
color : ↑(Set.Icc 1 solution_value) → Fin 2
⊢ coloring_is_good color

a : ℝ
ha : 1 < a
⊢ Bounded (solution a ha) ∧ ∀ (i j : ℕ), i ≠ j → 1 ≤ |solution a ha i - solution a ha j| * |↑i - ↑j|

n : ℕ
x : Fin n → ℝ
⊢ ∑ i, ∑ j, √|x i - x j| ≤ ∑ i, ∑ j, √|x i + x j|

a b c : ℤ
⊢ (a, b, c) ∈ SolutionSet ↔
    0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ is_power_of_two (a * b - c) ∧ is_power_of_two (b * c - a) ∧ is_power_of_two (c * a - b)
⊢ if DoesExist = true then ∃ f, Good f else ¬∃ f, Good f

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
a x : Fin n → ℝ
h : Monotone x
⊢ (⨆ i, d a i) / 2 ≤ ⨆ i, |x i - a i|

n : ℕ
hn : 0 < n
a : Fin n → ℝ
⊢ ∃ x, Monotone x ∧ (⨆ i, d a i) / 2 = ⨆ i, |x i - a i|

k : ℕ
hk : 2 ≤ k
a : ℕ+ → ℕ+
⊢ a ∈ SolutionSet hk ↔
    ∃ P,
      P.Monic ∧
        P.degree = ↑k ∧
          (∀ n ≤ k, 0 ≤ P.coeff n) ∧
            ∀ (n : ℕ+), Polynomial.eval (↑↑(a n)) P = ↑↑(∏ i ∈ Finset.range k, a ⟨↑n + i + 1, ⋯⟩)

G : Set (ℝ → ℝ)
hf : ∀ f ∈ G, ∃ a b, a ≠ 0 ∧ ∀ (x : ℝ), f x = a * x + b
hG : ∀ f ∈ G, ∀ g ∈ G, g ∘ f ∈ G
hinv : ∀ f ∈ G, (∀ (x : ℝ), f x ≠ 0) → f⁻¹ ∈ G
hfix : ∀ f ∈ G, ∃ x, f x = x
⊢ ∃ k, ∀ f ∈ G, f k = k

n : ℕ
